DataElement.preferredDefinition: the description of a subset of symptoms for renal function in multiple myeloma disease in a patient classifying disease based on standard criteria defined by Durie-Salmon.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to diagnosis of myeloma.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A bone marrow-based plasma cell neoplasm characterized by a serum monoclonal protein and skeletal destruction with osteolytic lesions, pathological fractures, bone pain, hypercalcemia, and anemia.  Clinical variants include non-secretory myeloma, smoldering myeloma, indolent myeloma, and plasma cell leukemia. (WHO, 2001) -- 2003

Concepts.definition: A bone marrow-based plasma cell neoplasm characterized by a serum monoclonal protein and skeletal destruction with osteolytic lesions, pathological fractures, bone pain, hypercalcemia, and anemia.  Clinical variants include non-secretory myeloma, smoldering myeloma, indolent myeloma, and plasma cell leukemia. (WHO, 2001)

Property.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: information related to the renal stage of myeloma diagnosis.

PermissibleValues.value: A (relatively normal renal function - serum creatinine <2.0 mg/dl)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: A (relatively normal renal function - serum creatinine <2.0 mg/dl)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A (relatively normal renal function - serum creatinine <2.0 mg/dl)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A (relatively normal renal function - serum creatinine <2.0 mg/dl)

PermissibleValues.value: B (abnormal renal function - serum creatinine >= 2.0 mg/dl)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: B (abnormal renal function - serum creatinine >= 2.0 mg/dl)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: B (abnormal renal function - serum creatinine >= 2.0 mg/dl)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: B (abnormal renal function - serum creatinine >= 2.0 mg/dl)
Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Renal; of, or pertaining to, the kidney.:The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

Concepts.definition: Of or pertaining to the kidney.
The extent of a cancer in the body.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2181361
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedDiagnosis > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation > PerformedClinicalInterpretation.value WHERE PerformedObservation.methodCode = "Durie-Salmon" AND PerformedDiagnosis.bodySystemCode = "Renal" AND PerformedDiagnosis.value = "Myeloma" AND AssessedResultRelationship.typeCode = "staging"
